SELECT customer.id AS customer_id, customer.avatar_url, customer.nickname,
topic.id, topic.content, topic.title, topic.publish_time, topic.total_share, topic.`status`, topic.video_url, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM topic_thumbsup WHERE topic_thumbsup.topic_id = topic.id)AS totalThumbsup, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM topic_coment WHERE topic_coment.topic_id = topic.id)AS totalComment,
img.id AS img_id, img.img_url AS imgUrl,
favorite.id AS favorite_id, favorite.favorite_time FROM ( SELECT * FROM favorite WHERE favorite.customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT #{page.start},#{page.pageSize} ) favorite LEFT JOIN topic ON topic_id = topic.id LEFT JOIN customer ON topic.customer_id = customer.id LEFT JOIN img ON img.img_type = '${@com.zx.redcross.tool.Constant@IMG_TYPE_TOPIC}' AND img.foreign_id = topic.id ORDER BY favorite.favorite_time DESC

SELECT knowledge.id, knowledge.content, knowledge.title, knowledge.publish_time, knowledge.total_share, knowledge.summary, knowledge.key_word, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM knowledge_thumbsup WHERE knowledge_thumbsup.knowledge_id = knowledge.id)AS totalThumbsup, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM knowledge_coment WHERE knowledge_coment.knowledge_id = knowledge.id)AS totalComment,
favorite.id AS favorite_id, favorite.favorite_time FROM ( SELECT * FROM favorite_knowledge WHERE favorite_knowledge.customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT #{page.start},#{page.pageSize} ) favorite LEFT JOIN knowledge ON knowledge_id = knowledge.id ORDER BY favorite.favorite_time DESC
